## Theme.(constructor)

Constructs a new instance of the `Theme` class

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(name: string, opt_blockStyles?: {
        [key: string]: BlockStyle;
    }, opt_categoryStyles?: {
        [key: string]: CategoryStyle;
    }, opt_componentStyles?: ComponentStyle);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | string | Theme name. |
|  opt\_blockStyles | { \[key: string\]: BlockStyle; } | <i>(Optional)</i> A map from style names (strings) to objects with style attributes for blocks. |
|  opt\_categoryStyles | { \[key: string\]: CategoryStyle; } | <i>(Optional)</i> A map from style names (strings) to objects with style attributes for categories. |
|  opt\_componentStyles | ComponentStyle | <i>(Optional)</i> A map of Blockly component names to style value. |
